title: Kcet Counselling Doubts
content:
1) Has ugcet counselling always taken place alongside ugneet counselling?
If yes have their been any exceptions to this over the years?

2) if ug neet counselling gets delayed will ugcet counselling also get delayed

3)I got a rank of 19XX in kcet there are chances of pes rr in last round 
In option filling i am gonna put 
Few colleges
Rr cse
Then ec cse
And then few other colleges
Mostly will get alloted ec cse in first round
And will pick choice 2 (satisfied with seat but want to proceed to next round,will pay fees etc)
But i think second round also i will be alloted pes ec cse
Since its the same college 
Do i have to pay fees for the second time or will kcet recognize that its the same seat and will tell me that i dont need to repeat the paying fees visiting college stuff
And will i be able to choose choice 2 again?

comments.body: If u want to choose 2nd option in first round, no need to pay any fees. In first round U have to pay fees only of u r satisfied with the seat that has been allocated to u.
And chances of getting cse re in further rounds depend on reservation. If u r from General category u won't get it.
When is the counsiling? kcet ki

We dont know yet 
With all the neet stuff happening
